sub_title: IT Manager | Business Analyst | Project Manager
summary: I enjoy working at the edge of business and technology! I bring more than ten years of experience managing IT applications and running end-to-end technical projects that accelerate business outcomes. Having broad expertise in business analysis, project management and product management I cover full cycle of value delivery ensuring governance and reliable controls. With my involvement, IT is no longer a black box: I put people and value they create in the center of everything.

school.name: Finance University under the Government of the Russian Federation

projects.title: Launch of Network Operation Center
projects.description:
As Project/Product manager I led an agile Incident management automation of full cycle of NOC support operations. 
• Business requirements definition and validation, translation into system requirements, definition of NOC support process, development of incident management procedure,
• An agile end-to-end process automation based on Jira Service Desk platform. 
• Meaningful dashboards that give extensive current state overview for NOC experts and management. 
By the first three months after implementation the amount of re-routed traffic due to low NOC performance (revenue loss) went down by 300k of monthly minutes in average.

projects.title: Interconnect Voice Carrier Launch
projects.description: As a part of project team successfully launched European interconnect voice carrier from the scratch being fully responsible as project manager and SME for IT and business processes development and IT solutions implementation, configuration, UAT and commercial run. The carrier now operates with 450 million minutes of monthly voice traffic serving more than 50 interconnections.

projects.title: Launch of Interconnect Billing
projects.description:
As Project manager and Business analyst I led Wholesale Billing implementation. 
• Business processes design and development: invoicing, reconciliation and dispute management. 
• Billing system roll-out planning, configuration, shadow billing, technical and business acceptance. Fine tuning through performance of billing operations. Business is now able to timely generate and process invoices with total dispute rate lower than 1.3%.
• Recruited and coached 2 award-winning billing managers.

profile_positions.description:
Connecting business, developers and operations (internal & offshore) in support of the Trade Finance segment.

• Serving the DevOps team as Business analyst and Scrum master to ensure sprint goals are met
• Gathering and analyzing business requirements, transforming them into solution design and advising business on the best solution alternative
• Steering process improvement initiatives: automation and process improvements
• Managing incidents, acceptance programs and releases to secure reliable deployments
• Setting up and maintaining support process and handy IT tools: monitoring (Splunk), reporting (PowerBI), knowledge-sharing (Confluence), progress trackers (Jira, Azure DevOps), CI/CD pipelines (Git, Azure).
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst | Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
Ensuring the newly introduced central incident management organization has all the processes, tools, knowledge and authority to eliminate major incidents across the whole LG network, video and IT product portfolio in European and Latin American countries

•	Continuously measured and improved the central major incident management process and tools ensuring service continuity and reflecting departmental effectiveness. 
•	Led and assisted in mitigations within Incident, Problem and Change Management teams in events of cross-departmental problems and process breaches. 
•	Supported and mentored the team of five service management professionals by defining best practice and quality standards and ensuring they are understood and followed.
profile_positions.title: Senior Incident Manager | Service Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Evaluated, designed and simplified core business processes to support teams in daily tasks and cross-functional collaboration ensuring business transparency and efficiency.
•	Led IT solutions roll-outs across operational companies with multimillion-dollar budget by managing delivery scope, schedule, budget, communications and guiding teams for contracts, hardware shipments, software development and acceptance programs.
•	Managed global procurement for IT solutions delivery engaging vendors and stakeholders in requirements definition, precise solution evaluation and contract preparation to ensure target business outcomes and cost-efficiency.
•	Developed a set of IT products by eliciting requirements, defining solution designs, managing backlog, guiding agile development and stakeholder engagement. Product launches led to increased business efficiency (up to 30% in contract management), secured target revenues and uncovered new business opportunities.
•	Engaging senior management, defined the principal IT landscape and its roll-out strategy in support of the new business direction: applications and cross-integrations.
•	Performed processes and systems adoption to align with industry standards and controls (GDPR, corporate and ITIL controls) engaging compliance and legal teams.
•	Led distributed teams of cross-functional experts (sales, legal, compliance, finance, DevOps) and senior management ensuring their timely contribution to project success and mitigating resistance. 
•	Recruited and mentored billing experts who recently won ‘Best Innovative Product’ industry award.
profile_positions.title: Senior Information Technology Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for end to end development and maintenance of business applications in support of wholesale business direction. Awarded as ‘Key staff member’ for the major contribution to achieving wholesale direction’s business goals.

• Performed requirements analysis and solutions design definition to scope desired automation collaborating with technical departments and engaging business stakeholders.
• Provided end to end support for the set of B2B IT systems. Served as single point of contact for business requests (incidents, change requests, data requests) ensuring proper classification, prioritization, troubleshooting, backlog management and coordination through further delivery according to contract terms or SLA.
• Contributed in complex IT implementations and data migrations on the roles of implementation lead, SME, quality engineer providing exhaustive support to project manager and team in delivery.
• Eliminated impact on business operations for deployed solutions by managing releases and acceptance programs: release notes, acceptance documents, coordinating UAT and providing technical support to business customers.
• Kept all changes documented by developing and updating system and project documentation: business processes, functional requirements, user guides, administrator manuals etc. so teams can swiftly refer to.
profile_positions.title: Lead Systems Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Developed an IT application to automate routing management and traffic reporting functions for domestic market segment (SQL, VBA).
• Provided end-user support and systems maintenance on application and database levels (MS SQL, Oracle).
